text:
We love the staff, they're wonderful. 
The food is awesome, the best Thai restaurant in The Montreal area

The cusine is EXCELLENT and authentic. The ambiance is comfortable, the decor is fresh and inviting. Dia has an interest in his customers and will greet everyone who comes in the door. The volume of food you get for the price is awesome. The waitresses are sweet andattentive. If I lived near I would eat there 4-5 times a week!! 5 stars!!!

Let me just say that I lived in Thailand and took cooking lessons there... I've been looking for a restaurant that tastes just like what I ate in Thailand... I found it... It's easily the greatest, most tastiest thai food in Quebec... Bravo Just Thai we love you;)

Cuisine authentique, bonne embiance, le propriétaire viendra vous accueillir avec un grand sourire et en plus son staff est courtois et prévenant. Si vous voulez manger épicé le chef vous emmènera aussi loin que vous voulez, le voyage va être chaud. Meilleur Thai dans le coin, a voir absolument!

plus besoin d'aller à Montréal pour un bon thaïlandais.
excellent .  .  .  pour être sûr d'avoir de la place il vaut mieux réservés

J'y suis retournée 2 autres fois depuis mon dernier post!! On ne se tanne pas!! Cette fois, nous avons essayé la salade de papaye (parfaitement épicée!), le porc au basilic (délicioso!), les aubergines au cari rouge (qui fondent littéralement dans la bouche!) et les pétoncles à la coriandre et citronelle (parfaitement saisies, fondantes en bouche aussi!!
Il y a tellement de choix et l'atmosphère cozy, conviviale, authentique font que ce petit resto niché de Terrebonne surpasse ceux de Montréal! ... Rien à redire!

Au Juste Thai was once one of my favourite restaurants to eat at in Terrebonne. There was no doubt about it. I was even so excited to have such excellent quality Thai food in Terrebonne. Chef Dia understood spice and flavour. However their prices have been raised and then raised again. I know cost of living in Quebec is high! For me there is a tipping point when a restaurant gets too expensive. I believe I've reached this with Juste Thai. The food is still very good. However for the small portion size (I always order takeout) it is just beyond my range of what I consider my comfort zone for regular bi monthly ordering. Dia and Boun are great guys and I wish them all the best, but I will only go here infrequently from now on. Best of luck guys, food still tastes great but not good value for me!
Hands down one of the best restaurants in Terrebonne. Awesome authentic Thai food. I wish I could go more often!

Authentic flavors, generous portions and great staff! The lychee martini inventive and delish. The pad thai has complex flavors and a perfect amount of heat! The only downside is when I go back home to Tennessee nothing else will even compare!
